entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @TrumpWarRoom S Korea and US had first COVID-19 case on the same day. Any differences now all about preparedness, planning, and leadership. 104,000 vs 269. WHO had working tests- we refused them. 2/7 Trump praised Xi: “handled it very well” and noted “we are working closely with China to help”
